data.message: Goin' after Trump ... world's upside down when YOU and MANSON end up on the wrong side of this! Y'all used to be the counter culture .. now you're just conformists.

replies.message: Remember when he dissed bill and bush whats the difference now?
Israel Razo Pinete He didn't diss Obama. Was he tooooo scared of the Alt left? Eminem forgets that he spent most of his career spitting vile hateful anti gay rhetoric.

Israel Razo Pinete  Simple .. main reason people don't like Trump is 'cause he does the same thing Em did (back when he had balls) .. so now how's Em hating? 

Jealousy. Trump took that sh*t and went pro!
